content: In what kind of building would you find Van Gogh's 'Starry Night', Monet's 'Water Lilies' and Picasso's 'Les Demoiselles d'Avignon'?

I believe that the building where you can find Van Gogh's 'Starry Night', Monet's 'Water Lilies', and Picasso's 'Les Demoiselles d'Avignon' is the Museum of Modern Art (MoMA) in New York City. MoMA is one of the most renowned modern art museums in the world, and it houses an impressive collection of works by these famous artists.
